title: Jocuserious
author: Jocuserious
content: It must have capital However, which one should you be more dependent on when it comes to making money from the casino!Is it really good luck for you?Which basic technique to use?

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Techniques will help yoy managing your bankroll properly, making it last longer, preventing you from losing money you can't afford to lose and to maximize your earnings on short term.However, the decisive factor is always luck, since results are random, so you have to be a lucky gambler to hit random results in your favour. I would say gambling is 90% luck and 10% technique. You can be a very skilled gambler, but without luck you are doomed, anyway.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Can you established what’s the main goal of your topic because it comprises with different question that doesn’t revolve to the title.Quote from: Jocuserious on August 26, 2023, 02:53:06 PMIs it really good luck for you?Which basic technique to use?Good luck is the major attribute to win in the casino since most game is a luck base game. Strategy will just make you gambling in controlled manner but it doesn't help you to increase your chance of winning since the game is not affected by any strategy due to its randomness.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on August 26, 2023, 02:53:06 PMHowever, which one should you be more dependent on when it comes to making money from the casino!Is it really good luck for you?Which basic technique to use?If you do not want to be addicted to gambling, do not think of making money from gambling sites. You might be lucky at first, but casinos or other gambling sites will be lucky in long term. Just have fun while gambling and do not use more than an amount of money that you can not afford to lose. Gambling is not a way to make money.

comments.author: adzino
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on August 26, 2023, 02:53:06 PMIt must have capital However, which one should you be more dependent on when it comes to making money from the casino!Is it really good luck for you?Which basic technique to use?It's mostly about luck since most games are pure chances and the numbers are completely random following no sequences. Even when you feel like you're on a roll, always remember the house has an edge and eventually, your streak might run dry and you may "go out of luck". There are games like poker and blackjack where some skill and basic technique come into play, but again, a lot of it boils down to luck (I mean, who knows which card you'll draw next, right?). Yeah, strategies can help to an extent, but never forget the unpredictability of the game. If someone says they know a "strategy" that will always let you win, he is lying.

comments.author: tusandii
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on August 26, 2023, 02:53:06 PMIt must have capital However, which one should you be more dependent on when it comes to making money from the casino!Is it really good luck for you?Which basic technique to use?Not only capital but also confidence, experience, knowledge and luck because if you have all of that then victory can be easily obtained.But apart from all that the most difficult thing to get is luck.Do not let us gamble only with capital and of course the understanding that must always be remembered is that gambling is very difficult to win, most of the time in the casino I'm sure all gamblers have more losses compared to wins.There is no technique that can really be relied on and the most important thing to have is self-control and finances, especially for ourselves, who must determine how to act in every game we choose.

comments.author: bangjoe
comments.body: Make money from the casino? I doubt that if you are looking for money in the casino then you will get crazy losses because your psychology will go wild when you face the casino to get money.It all depends on luck, unless you play poker and others that require skill, then there you need skill to win.It should be remembered that apart from that you need to have the ability to manage money and manage your greed, if you have good luck but you have greed within you then luck is just a story for gamblers who are greedy in terms of victory.

comments.author: n0ne
comments.body: Luck is the main factor that helps with the winning on Casinos. For better bank roll management gamblers used to follow some techniques. This limits the spending and lets the gambler to take break at right time to avoid loses. However there is always risk and we can't be sure of the winning.Different games have got varied house edge, depending upon that there will be increase/decrease in the chance of winning.

comments.author: komisariatku
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on August 26, 2023, 02:53:06 PMIt must have capital However, which one should you be more dependent on when it comes to making money from the casino!Is it really good luck for you?Which basic technique to use?From what I know, a casino is not a place to make money. I think we shouldn't think like that because the risk of playing gambling in casinos has more chances of losing than winning.Casino is a place for fun, you better think so. Most people will spend more money in the casino than they earn money. Unless you are a professional at analyzing football matches, maybe you can make a lot of money there, but I'm not sure luck will always comeIf you gamble on a sportbook, there is no pure luck there, you must have good analysis to win. If playing slots, in my opinion, there are no tricks that can be done, as far as I know, if you have spent a lot of money on slot games, they will distribute the jackpot. But even if you get the jackpot, chances are that your lost money will not come back from the jackpot results

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on August 26, 2023, 02:53:06 PMIt must have capital That's for sure, you can't do much if you don't have capital, even if you play with the bonus you get from the casino, it's still your capital, it's needed if you want to gamble.Quote from: Jocuserious on August 26, 2023, 02:53:06 PMHowever, which one should you be more dependent on when it comes to making money from the casino!Depending on the game you are playing, slots in my opinion are a winning game closer to luck, strategy poker, sports betting sports science that you need to master, at least you understand the team, players, field before betting and so on.Quote from: Jocuserious on August 26, 2023, 02:53:06 PMIs it really good luck for you?Generally that's what we often see and often happens, luck in victory.Quote from: Jocuserious on August 26, 2023, 02:53:06 PMWhich basic technique to use?No technique, only belief and effort to get the win well.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on August 26, 2023, 02:53:06 PMIt must have capital However, which one should you be more dependent on when it comes to making money from the casino!Is it really good luck for you?Which basic technique to use?Luck, bankroll management, and most important of all control, control is the hardest you always have the feeling that you can continue winning and you can at least recover some of your losses I am someone who most of the time bites the dust when it comes to the technique I do a variation of martingale sometime I stop and do my own variation I love playing manual so I have control of my bets but overall it should about having fun and your mindset should not be in recovering you're losses or making big money.Winning in gambling just happens and most of the time it happens when you least expect it, its a game of chance and that is why we are attracted to it.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on August 26, 2023, 02:53:06 PMIt must have capital However, which one should you be more dependent on when it comes to making money from the casino!Just as others have mentioned; you should never take gambling as a means to make money because the chances of you winning your bet is not certain ( depending on what you're betting on ).QuoteIs it really good luck for you?Which basic technique to use?Like I said before, it depends on the game you want to place a bet on. If you're into slots then you would be needing loads of luck to win there but in the case of sport betting you need skill and also the knowledge of the sport you're to place a bet on because you can't just log into your gabling account and start to wager on teams that you know nothing about it reduces your chance of winning unlike when you're familiar with the sport and also the players in that specific team.So in a way you would be needing both of them (depending on what you're into).

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Be dependent on your skills and you will learn a technique but first learn the game with a capital. Every loss teaches you a lesson. One lesson could be to stop while you are yet not losing yet thousands or another lesson such as never giving up until you hit big. What does it take to play casino? It's just your audacity. Heck, you can play with just free spin. Or use the faucets to get a few satoshis and bet them. When luck is on your side, you may win.

comments.author: retreat
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on August 26, 2023, 02:53:06 PMIt must have capital However, which one should you be more dependent on when it comes to making money from the casino!Is it really good luck for you?Which basic technique to use?Of course good luck, because without luck whatever technique you use when gambling will be useless. For a gambler luck comes first because with good luck even with just a few dollars you can turn that into thousands of dollars and make you rich in one night.And also I rely on money and emotional management, because without this my gambling activities might fall apart and that's what keeps me on track and not overspending.

comments.author: Stepstowealth
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on August 26, 2023, 02:53:06 PMHowever, which one should you be more dependent on when it comes to making money from the casino!It requires smart moves to gamble profitably on casino. It requires proper strategy to gain.Have a good strategy.Do not chase your losses.Plan the money to gamble with.Do not gamble all the time, have a schedule for gambling so you can control the habit. Play games that you are used to, do not gamble on games that you are not familiar with.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on August 26, 2023, 02:53:06 PMIt must have capital However, which one should you be more dependent on when it comes to making money from the casino!Is it really good luck for you?Which basic technique to use?If you want to gamble you just need three things:1. Money2. Personal documents 3. InternetAnd you are ready to go, though if you mean on how to get money out a hobby like gambling then I would say it is almost 100% luck.They are some techniques which could help you to manage your win/losses, but you have to keep in mind that in the long term the house is always going to win. Casinos are businesses and not charities, and since it is a successful business you have to learn that the profitably comes from the bad luck of gamblers. If you want to search for techniques and ways to handle your money, then be my guest; but never openly trust when an stranger on the internet offers you any thing which could allegedly increase your chances of winning. There are scams everywhere nowadays. Good luck.

comments.author: Westinhome
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on August 26, 2023, 02:53:06 PMIt must have capital However, which one should you be more dependent on when it comes to making money from the casino!Is it really good luck for you?Which basic technique to use?The most important one is the mind to play the gambling,because once you want to play gambling.Then you automatically arrange the funds from the monthly earnings.Most of the gamblers will arrange the capital from the income and earnings.The luck only favor the most liked people of the gambling.The technique can be learned using by playing same game many times.The tactics should be created based on your own knowledge.Because your money so don't follow the other people tactics.

comments.author: panjul07
comments.body: Quote from: Hispo on August 26, 2023, 04:47:45 PMIf you want to gamble you just need three things:1. Money2. Personal documents 3. InternetSo its all about the practical things only? Why you do not mention devices (phone or PC)? Although you have all above three, how will you gamble in online casinos?   Personal documents is not a must because there are still some online casinos where KYC is not needed at all or at least not mandatory. Quote from: Jocuserious on August 26, 2023, 02:53:06 PMIs it really good luck for you?Which basic technique to use?Yes it is pure luck if you play luck based game but you can use some strategies but strategies wont change your luck. The best technique is to manage yourself, you need to have full control of yourself, control of your money as well as control of your emotion.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: If there is a strategy it will be gamble as you can run the expenses and not regret your account. That is you need to be wise to know when your luck is favouring you and when it has left you. You always have the leverage to wake away without anybody holding you back and you have to know how to manage your bankroll. Avoid virtual soccer if you can't bear spontaneous losses. Over all, gambling is luck based and no particular strategy is perfect, you win some and you will lose some but the owners win more.

comments.author: kamvreto
comments.body: It will always be based on luck, because luck in gambling gives you an advantage. Games in gambling such as slots place a lot of emphasis on luck and when you play the game, but for card games and others there may be some analysis and game skills required. No specific basic techniques are required to play. basic techniques only on games like blackjack etc. I don't even fully understand, because I usually play slots and other entertainment games without even thinking.
